title: Zebina sloaniana
text:
Zebina sloaniana is a <a href="species">species</a> of <a href="sea%20snail">sea snail</a>, a <a href="marine%20%28ocean%29">marine</a> <a href="gastropod">gastropod</a> <a href="mollusk">mollusk</a> or <a href="micromollusk">micromollusk</a> in the <a href="family%20%28biology%29">family</a> <a href="Zebinidae">Zebinidae</a>.
Distribution.
This species occurs in the <a href="Caribbean%20Sea">Caribbean Sea</a>, the <a href="Gulf%20of%20Mexico">Gulf of Mexico</a> and the <a href="Lesser%20Antilles">Lesser Antilles</a>; in the Atlantic Ocean off <a href="North%20Carolina">North Carolina</a>.
Description.
The maximum recorded <a href="gastropod%20shell">shell</a> length is 5 mm.
Habitat.
Minimum recorded depth is 0 m. Maximum recorded depth is 23 m.
